about_the_game:
Climbing Mountain Sins invites you to embark on a daring and transformative journey of redemption. In this immersive 3D platformer, you find yourself trapped in the clutches of seven deadly sins, each one a formidable challenge that must be overcome to attain ultimate salvation.



Featuring a unique blend of intense climbing mechanics and thought-provoking gameplay, Climbing Mountain Sins offers a compelling experience that will push your skills and determination to the limit. As you navigate through sin-infested regions, you'll face treacherous obstacles, cunning puzzles, and exhilarating platforming sequences that demand precise timing and agility.



But it's not just about conquering the physical challenges. The sins you encounter are deeply ingrained within your character, testing your willpower and resolve. As you progress, you'll need to confront the underlying issues that led to your downfall, making choices that shape your path to redemption. Will you succumb to temptation or rise above it?

Each sin is meticulously designed to reflect its unique nature and symbolism. From the slothful depths of Tembellik to the alluring traps of Lust's lair, every sin-infused region offers a visually stunning and thematically rich environment to explore. Discover hidden secrets, uncover the stories of those who fell before you, and unravel the mysteries that lie at the heart of your journey.



Climbing Mountain Sins also offers a rich replayability factor. With multiple paths and hidden collectibles, there are countless reasons to revisit each sin-ridden level and discover new surprises. Compete with friends and fellow climbers on leaderboards, striving for the fastest times and the highest scores.

Are you ready to face your inner demons, scale the heights of salvation, and emerge triumphant? The climb awaits, beckoning those brave enough to seek redemption. Will you ascend to absolution?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent

short_description: Embark on a challenging journey of redemption in Climbing Mountain Sins. Conquer sins, and climb to heavenly salvation. Master climbing, face obstacles, uncover secrets. A keyboard-breaking, nail-biting adventure. Can you ascend and overcome your inner demons? Rise to absolution!
